title: Presidio of San Francisco: Park Home
body: Experience a Diversity of Natural and Cultural History  For 218 years, the Presidio served as an army post for three nations. World and local events, from military campaigns to World Fairs and earthquakes, left their mark. Come enjoy the history and the natural beauty of the Presidio. Explore centuries of architecture. Reflect in a national cemetery. Walk along an historic airfield, through forests or to beaches, and admire spectacular vistas. Read More               Download it here!   A new way to Find Your Park        Learn About the Centennial Celebration   Celebrate the National Park Service Centennial at Golden Gate              Info for Visitors with Disabilities   Find out what accessibility resources are available in GGNRA        GGNRA Dog Management Plan    Learn about the planning process to decide how to manage dog walking in the Golden Gate NRA
